repairedDockerfile:
FROM debian:stretch-slim

LABEL maintainer="Eric Goller"

RUN apt-get update -qq && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y \
 git \
 python-setuptools \
 python-pip \
 python-dev \
 python3-dev \
 build-essential \
 python-wheel \
 xvfb \
 xauth \
 curl \
 locales \
 gir1.2-pango-1.0 \
 gir1.2-gtk-3.0 \
 libglib2.0-dev \
 libgtk-3-dev \
 python-gi \
 python3-gi \
 python-cairo \
 python-gi-cairo && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;

RUN locale-gen C.UTF-8 && /usr/sbin/update-locale LANG=C.UTF-8
ENV LANG=C.UTF-8 LANGUAGE=C.UTF-8 LC_ALL=C.UTF-8

RUN mkdir hamster-gtk
WORKDIR hamster-gtk
